channel.title: Object/npc/grounditem view distance
channel.description: Having trouble finding where to change the view distance of surrounding objects/npcs/grounditems in order to allow those further away to still remain in view instead of only 16 tiles away at most from the player.

item.title: Object/npc/grounditem view distance
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Redoing the way entities load is beyond my ability right now. I tilted the camera to a lower angle and zoomed in a bit but the distance loading becomes apparent when like that. Can’t be picky, just have to move on and keep developing the new landscape and content.

Read full topic

item.title: Object/npc/grounditem view distance
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“cleako, post:6, topic:543230”]Logically the client is where the secondary limit would be but I have scoured it looking and not found where.[/quote]Looks like you need to redo the way ground items work.

Read full topic

Logically the client is where the secondary limit would be but I have scoured it looking and not found where.

item.title: Object/npc/grounditem view distance
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“cleako, post:3, topic:543230”]When modifying the getViewedArea array, I can use smaller numbers to decrease the loading distance of objects, npcs, and ground items but cannot increase it beyond the defaults and see any change. Something else must be limiting it.

public List<GameObject> getGameObjectsInView() { List<GameObject> objects = new ArrayList<GameObject>(); ActiveTile[][] viewArea = getViewedArea(21, 21, 21, 21);[/quote]

pretty sure default corresponds to the limit in the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Object/npc/grounditem view distance
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“cleako, post:3, topic:543230”]When modifying the getViewedArea array, I can use smaller numbers to decrease the loading distance of objects, npcs, and ground items but cannot increase it beyond the defaults and see any change. Something else must be limiting it.

public List<GameObject> getGameObjectsInView() { List<GameObject> objects = new ArrayList<GameObject>(); ActiveTile[][] viewArea = getViewedArea(21, 21, 21, 21);[/quote]Did you change the limit in the client?

Read full topic
